description: Sasha's no sexual novice, and she regularly videotapes her own sexual exploits. But when it comes to BDSM, though she's been tied up, she's never been subjected to the loving attentions of an expert rigger. We introduce this eager explorer to a place she's never been -- a country where rope, ball-gags, and vibrators are the national currency.
title: Casting Couch 3
